title: Step 5: Adding depth to the scene

cells.data:
To add light and depth to the scene by first: Adding two doors down the hallway using loop cuts to add additional light:



Then adding a mirror to the end of the hallway. This is just a rectangle with an Inset bevel ( press I), then adding a Glossy shader to it.



I then added a piece of artwork on the opposite wall that would reflect off the mirror:



Here is a render with the new elements in place:
